Item.source: 设置以内嵌方式打开的文档类型
点击此处展开详细错误信息......
Item.target: click here to expand error details......

Item.source: 点击此处关闭详细错误信息......
Item.target: click here to close error details......
Are you sure close the window?

Item.source: 确认删除所选的文件吗？
Item.target: Confirmation to delete the selected file?

Item.source: 您选择的文件路径长度超过了限制，请尝试减少选择文件的数量
Item.target: You select the file path is longer than the limit, try to reduce the number of selected files.

Item.source: 至少要选择一个上传文件！
您还有未上传的文件，确定要关闭本窗口吗？
Item.target: You have not uploaded the file, sure you want to close this window?

Item.source: 每个上传文件的尺寸必须小于{0}字节
Item.target: Each upload file size must be less than {0} bytes

Item.source: 您有正在打开的文档文件，当前的页面不能关闭，请您保存文件后再关闭页面！
Item.target: You are opening the document file, the current page can not be closed, save the file before you close the page!

Item.source: 您编辑了文件但没有保存当前文件，请您保存文件后再关闭页面！
Item.target: You edit the file but not save the current file, save the file before you close the page!

Item.source: 整数部分的位数不能超过{0}位
Item.target: Integral part of the median can not be more than {0}

Item.source: 小数部分的位数不能超过{0}位
Item.target: Fractional part of the median can not be more than {0}
Number must be greater than or equal to {0}
Number must be less than or equal to {0}

Item.source: 数字类型只能有一个小数点
Item.target: Only one decimal point numeric type

Item.source: 用户没有权限打开此文件
Item.target: You do not have permission to open this file.

Item.source: 文件可能无效或被撤回。{0}
Item.target: The file may be invalid or withdrawn. {0}

Item.source: 不能找到ID为{0}的Activity信息，此文件可能已经流转走或被撤回。
Item.target: Cannot find the ID '{0}' activity. The file may be invalid or withdrawn.
Can not find the ID '{0}' process.
Cannot find the ID '{0}' process and the ID '{1}' activity.

Item.source: 没有执行BeginProcessChanges，不能回滚流程状态改变。
Item.target: Do not execute BeginProcessChanges, process state changes can not be rolled back.

Item.source: 没有执行BeginProcessChanges，不能提交流程状态改变。
Item.target: Do not execute BeginProcessChanges, process state changes can not be submitted.

Item.source: 存在未移交的流程状态改变
Item.target: There are some not commited state changes.

Item.source: 流程上下文没有初始化，不能得到当前节点
Item.target: ProcessContext has not initialized, can not get the current activity.
Do you want to withdraw the process ?

Item.source: 确认要作废或取消流程吗？
Item.target: Do you want to reject or cancel this process ?

Item.source: 没有选择下一步的流转人员
Item.target: You didn't choose the next step operators.
Do you want to perform the operation ?
Do you want to return the form ?

Item.source: 确认要送签并强制结束流程吗？
Item.target: Do you want to send this form and enforce the end of process ?
Please select a file to upload.

Item.source: 复制当前表单的数据并且启动一个新流程
Item.target: Copy current form's data and start up a new process

Item.source: 作废当前流程，并且生成一份新的表单
Item.target: Abort current process and restart a new form

Item.source: 允许环节审批人员为空
环节审批人员必须为空

Item.target: Please fill in the reject comments

Item.source: 会签时，所有用户通过后流转到下一步
Item.target: Transfer to next step when all users must approved in consign step.

Item.source: 多条意见之间请使用英文空格或回车分隔；
Item.target: Between the number of comments, please use the space or carriage return separated.

Item.source: 所有意见（包含分隔符）的总长度不能超过200个字。
Item.target: All comments (including separators) of the total length of not more than 200 charactors.
Do you want to delete the step ?
Please select who to send read

Item.source: 当前流程的状态已经改变，不能流转
Item.target: The current state of the process has changed, not circulation

Item.source: 请设置 {0} 环节的审批人员
Item.target: Please set the operator for step '{0}'.
Please select the step which you want to return to.
Please fill in the return comments.
Please select the person to be forwarded
Please select the person to process
Can only select a single user

Item.source: 请联系管理员调整流程
Item.target: Please contact the administrator to adjust process

Item.source: 流程状态已经改变，您不能执行作废操作
Item.target: Process state has changed, you can not reject the process.

Item.source: 流程状态已经改变，您不能执行撤回操作
Item.target: Process state has changed, you can not withdraw the action execution.

Item.source: 在图中选择需要修改的流程活动点，然后点击此链接进行修改
Item.target: First select the activity of the need to modify the process in Figure, and then click on this link to make changes

Item.source: 确定要作废或取消流程吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to cancel the process ?

Item.source: 确定要还原作废(取消)的流程吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to restore the process ?
Are you sure to pause the process ?

Item.source: 确定要恢复暂停的流程吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to resume the process ?

Item.source: 确认要退出维护状态吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to exit the maintaining mode ?

Item.source: 确认要异步作废流程吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to cancel the process asynchronously ?

Item.source: 确认要异步撤回流程吗？
Item.target: Are you sure to withdraw the process asynchronously ?

Item.source: 修改活动操作人失败，原因：
Item.target: Modify the activity operation failed due to:

Item.source: 流程不在运行中，无法作废。
Item.target: Process is not running, can not be canceled

Item.source: 无法修改已完成的活动！
Item.target: Completed activities can not be modified !

Item.source: 请先选择需要修改的活动！
Item.target: Please select an activity which you want to modify !

Item.source: 包含分支流程的活动节点

Item.target: Can not find the activity which ID is {0}

Item.source: 修改当前活动点操作人失败！失败原因：{0}
Item.target: Fail to modify the assignees of activity. The reason is {0}
Process is not started, can not reject.

Item.source: 流程不是已经作废的，无法还原
Item.target: Process is not aborted, can not restore.

Item.source: 流程不在运行中，无法暂停
Item.target: Process is not running, can not pause.

Item.source: 流程不在暂停中，无法恢复
Item.target: Process is not paused, can not resume.

Item.source: 流程已经作废或者完成，无法重新计算
Item.target: Process is aborted or completed, can not recalculate.

Item.source: 流程不在运行中，无法撤回
Item.target: Process is not running, can not withdraw.

Item.source: 流程不在维护状态，无法执行此操作
Item.target: Process is not in maintaining mode, can not do this operation.

Item.source: 不能获取到当前流程信息
Item.target: Can not get the current process info.

Item.source: 您没有权限执行此操作
Item.target: You don't have permission to do this operation.
Do you want to save the draft ?
Do you want to save the form ?
Do you want to send the form ?
Do you want to withdraw the process ?
Do you want to abort the process ?
Do you want to restore the process ?
Do you want to resume the process ?
Do you want to pause the process ?
